Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

12  KSWriteVTK::KSWriteVTK() :
13  fBase( "" ),
14  fPath( "" ),
15  fTrackPointFlag( false ),
16  fTrackPointComponent( NULL ),
17  fTrackPointAction( NULL, NULL ),
18  fTrackDataFlag( false ),
19  fTrackDataComponent( NULL ),
20  fTrackDataActions(),
21  fStepPointFlag( false ),
22  fStepPointComponent( NULL ),
23  fStepPointAction( NULL, NULL ),
24  fStepDataFlag( false ),
25  fStepDataComponent( NULL ),
26  fStepDataActions()
27  {
28  }
29  KSWriteVTK::KSWriteVTK( const KSWriteVTK& aCopy ) :
30  KSComponent(),
31  fBase( aCopy.fBase ),
32  fPath( aCopy.fPath ),
33  fTrackPointFlag( false ),
34  fTrackPointComponent( NULL ),
35  fTrackPointAction( NULL, NULL ),
36  fTrackDataFlag( false ),
37  fTrackDataComponent( NULL ),
38  fTrackDataActions(),
39  fStepPointFlag( false ),
40  fStepPointComponent( NULL ),
41  fStepPointAction( NULL, NULL ),
42  fStepDataFlag( false ),
43  fStepDataComponent( NULL ),
44  fStepDataActions()
45  {
46  }
47  KSWriteVTK* KSWriteVTK::Clone() const
48  {
49  return new KSWriteVTK( *this );
50  }

52  {

56  {
57  fBase = aBase;
58  return;

62  fPath = aPath;

66  void KSWriteVTK::ExecuteRun()
67  {
68  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << fName << "> is filling a run" << eom );
69  return;
70  }
71  void KSWriteVTK::ExecuteEvent()
72  {
73  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << fName << "> is filling an event" << eom );
74  BreakTrack();
75  return;
76  }
77  void KSWriteVTK::ExecuteTrack()
78  {
79  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << fName << "> is filling a track" << eom );
80  BreakStep();
81  FillTrack();
82  return;
83  }
84  void KSWriteVTK::ExecuteStep()
85  {
86  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is filling a step" << eom );
87  FillStep();
88  return;
89  }
90 
91  void KSWriteVTK::SetTrackPoint( KSComponent* anComponent )
92  {
93  if( fTrackPointFlag == false )
94  {
95  if( fTrackPointComponent == NULL )
96  {
97  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is adding a track point object" << eom );
98  fTrackPointFlag = true;
99  fTrackPointComponent = anComponent;
100  AddTrackPoint( anComponent );
101  return;
102  }
103  else
104  {
105  if( fTrackPointComponent == anComponent )
106  {
107  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is enabling a track point object" << eom );
108  fTrackPointFlag = true;
109  return;
110  }
111  else
112  {
113  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> tried to set a different track point object" << eom;
114  return;
115  }
116  }
117  }
118  else
119  {
120  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> tried to set a second track point object" << eom;
121  return;
122  }
123  }
124  void KSWriteVTK::ClearTrackPoint( KSComponent* anComponent )
125  {
126  if( fTrackPointFlag == false )
127  {
128  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> tried to clear a cleared track point object" << eom;
129  return;
130  }
131  else
132  {
133  if( fTrackPointComponent == NULL )
134  {
135  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> tried to clear a null track point object" << eom;
136  return;
137  }
138  else
139  {
140  if( fTrackPointComponent == anComponent )
141  {
142  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is clearing a track point object" << eom );
143  BreakTrack();
144  fTrackPointFlag = false;
145  return;
146  }
147  else
148  {
149  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> tried to clear a different track point object" << eom;
150  return;
151  }
152  }
153  }
154  }
155

192  {
193  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> tried to clear a cleared track data object" << eom;
194  return;

196  else
197  {

350 
351  void KSWriteVTK::InitializeComponent()
352  {
353  wtrmsg_debug( "starting VTK writer" << eom );
354 
355  fStepPoints = vtkSmartPointer< vtkPoints >::New();
356  fStepLines = vtkSmartPointer< vtkCellArray >::New();
357  fStepData = vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyData >::New();
358 
359  fStepData->SetPoints( fStepPoints );
360  fStepData->SetLines( fStepLines );
361 
362  fTrackPoints = vtkSmartPointer< vtkPoints >::New();
363  fTrackVertices = vtkSmartPointer< vtkCellArray >::New();
364  fTrackData = vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyData >::New();
365 
366  fTrackData->SetPoints( fTrackPoints );
367  fTrackData->SetVerts( fTrackVertices );
368 
369  return;
370  }
371  void KSWriteVTK::DeinitializeComponent()
372  {
373  wtrmsg_debug( "stopping VTK writer" << eom );
374 
375  if( fBase.length() == 0 )
376  {
377  fBase = GetName();
378  }
379 
380  if( fPath.length() == 0 )
381  {
382  fPath = OUTPUT_DEFAULT_DIR;
383  }
384 
385  vtkSmartPointer< vtkXMLPolyDataWriter > tStepWriter = vtkSmartPointer< vtkXMLPolyDataWriter >::New();
386  tStepWriter->SetFileName( (fPath + string( "/" ) + fBase + string( "Step.vtp" )).c_str() );
387  tStepWriter->SetDataModeToBinary();
388 #ifdef VTK6
389  tStepWriter->SetInputData( fStepData );
390 #else
391  tStepWriter->SetInput( fStepData );
392 #endif
393  tStepWriter->Write();
394 
395  vtkSmartPointer< vtkXMLPolyDataWriter > tTrackWriter = vtkSmartPointer< vtkXMLPolyDataWriter >::New();
396  tTrackWriter->SetFileName( (fPath + string( "/" ) + fBase + string( "Track.vtp" )).c_str() );
397  tTrackWriter->SetDataModeToBinary();
398 #ifdef VTK6
399  tTrackWriter->SetInputData( fTrackData );
400 #else
401  tTrackWriter->SetInput( fTrackData );
402 #endif
403  tTrackWriter->Write();
404 
405  return;
406  }
407 
408  void KSWriteVTK::AddTrackPoint( KSComponent* anComponent )
409  {
410  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> making track point action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom )
411 
412  KThreeVector* tThreeVector = anComponent->As< KThreeVector >();
413  if( tThreeVector != NULL )
414  {
415  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a three_vector" << eom )
416  fTrackPointAction.first = anComponent;
417  fTrackPointAction.second = new PointAction( tThreeVector, fTrackIds, fTrackPoints );
418  return;
419  }
420 
421  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> cannot make point action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
422 
423  return;
424  }
425 
426  void KSWriteVTK::AddTrackData( KSComponent* anComponent )
427  {
428  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> making track data action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom )
429 
430  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = anComponent->As< KSComponentGroup >();
431  if( tComponentGroup != NULL )
432  {
433  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a group" << eom )
434  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
435  {
436  AddTrackData( tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex ) );
437  }
438  return;
439  }
440 
441  string* tString = anComponent->As< string >();
442  if( tString != NULL )
443  {
444  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a string" << eom )
445  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring string object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
446  return;
447  }
448 
449  KTwoVector* tTwoVector = anComponent->As< KTwoVector >();
450  if( tTwoVector != NULL )
451  {
452  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a two_vector" << eom )
453  vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray >::New();
454  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
455  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 2 );
456  fTrackData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
457  fTrackDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new TwoVectorAction( tTwoVector, tArray ) ) );
458  return;
459  }
460  KThreeVector* tThreeVector = anComponent->As< KThreeVector >();
461  if( tThreeVector != NULL )
462  {
463  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a three_vector" << eom )
464  vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray >::New();
465  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
466  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 3 );
467  fTrackData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
468  fTrackDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new ThreeVectorAction( tThreeVector, tArray ) ) );
469  return;
470  }
471 
472  bool* tBool = anComponent->As< bool >();
473  if( tBool != NULL )
474  {
475  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a bool" << eom )
476  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring bool object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
477  return;
478  }
479 
480  unsigned short* tUShort = anComponent->As< unsigned short >();
481  if( tUShort != NULL )
482  {
483  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is an unsigned_short" << eom )
484  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring unsigned short object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
485  return;
486  }
487  short* tShort = anComponent->As< short >();
488  if( tShort != NULL )
489  {
490  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a short" << eom )
491  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring short object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
492  return;
493  }
494 
495  unsigned int* tUInt = anComponent->As< unsigned int >();
496  if( tUInt != NULL )
497  {
498  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a unsigned_int" << eom )
499  vtkSmartPointer< vtkUnsignedIntArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkUnsignedIntArray >::New();
500  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
501  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
502  fTrackData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
503  fTrackDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new UIntAction( tUInt, tArray ) ) );
504  return;
505  }
506  int* tInt = anComponent->As< int >();
507  if( tInt != NULL )
508  {
509  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is an int" << eom )
510  vtkSmartPointer< vtkIntArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkIntArray >::New();
511  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
512  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
513  fTrackData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
514  fTrackDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new IntAction( tInt, tArray ) ) );
515  return;
516  }
517 
518  unsigned long* tULong = anComponent->As< unsigned long >();
519  if( tULong != NULL )
520  {
521  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is an unsigned_long" << eom )
522  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring unsigned long object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
523  return;
524  }
525  long* tLong = anComponent->As< long >();
526  if( tLong != NULL )
527  {
528  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a long" << eom )
529  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring long object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
530  return;
531  }
532 
533  float* tFloat = anComponent->As< float >();
534  if( tFloat != NULL )
535  {
536  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a float" << eom )
537  vtkSmartPointer< vtkFloatArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkFloatArray >::New();
538  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
539  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
540  fTrackData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
541  fTrackDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new FloatAction( tFloat, tArray ) ) );
542  return;
543  }
544  double* tDouble = anComponent->As< double >();
545  if( tDouble != NULL )
546  {
547  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a double" << eom )
548  vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray >::New();
549  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
550  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
551  fTrackData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
552  fTrackDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new DoubleAction( tDouble, tArray ) ) );
553  return;
554  }
555 
556  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer cannot make data action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
557 
558  return;
559  }
560 
561  void KSWriteVTK::FillTrack()
562  {
563  if( fTrackPointFlag == true )
564  {
565  if( fTrackDataFlag == true )
566  {
567  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is filling a track" << eom );
568 
569  fTrackPointAction.first->PullUpdate();
570  fTrackPointAction.second->Execute();
571  fTrackPointAction.first->PullDeupdate();
572 
573  for( ActionIt tIt = fTrackDataActions.begin(); tIt != fTrackDataActions.end(); tIt++ )
574  {
575  tIt->first->PullUpdate();
576  tIt->second->Execute();
577  tIt->first->PullDeupdate();
578  }
579  }
580  }
581 
582  return;
583  }
584 
585  void KSWriteVTK::BreakTrack()
586  {
587  if( fTrackPointFlag == true )
588  {
589  if( fTrackDataFlag == true )
590  {
591  if( fTrackIds.empty() == false )
592  {
593  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is breaking a track set with <" << fTrackIds.size() << "> elements" << eom );
594 
595  vtkSmartPointer< vtkVertex > tVertex = vtkSmartPointer< vtkVertex >::New();
596  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fTrackIds.size(); tIndex++ )
597  {
598  tVertex->GetPointIds()->SetId( tIndex, fTrackIds.at( tIndex ) );
599  fTrackVertices->InsertNextCell( tVertex );
600  }
601  fTrackIds.clear();
602  }
603  }
604  }
605 
606  return;
607  }
608 
609  void KSWriteVTK::AddStepPoint( KSComponent* anComponent )
610  {
611  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> making step point action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom )
612 
613  KThreeVector* tThreeVector = anComponent->As< KThreeVector >();
614  if( tThreeVector != NULL )
615  {
616  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a three_vector" << eom )
617  fStepPointAction.first = anComponent;
618  fStepPointAction.second = new PointAction( tThreeVector, fStepIds, fStepPoints );
619  return;
620  }
621 
622  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> cannot make point action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
623 
624  return;
625  }
626 
627  void KSWriteVTK::AddStepData( KSComponent* anComponent )
628  {
629  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> making step data action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom )
630 
631  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = anComponent->As< KSComponentGroup >();
632  if( tComponentGroup != NULL )
633  {
634  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a group" << eom )
635  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
636  {
637  AddStepData( tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex ) );
638  }
639  return;
640  }
641 
642  string* tString = anComponent->As< string >();
643  if( tString != NULL )
644  {
645  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a string" << eom )
646  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring string object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
647  return;
648  }
649 
650  KTwoVector* tTwoVector = anComponent->As< KTwoVector >();
651  if( tTwoVector != NULL )
652  {
653  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a two_vector" << eom )
654  vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray >::New();
655  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
656  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 2 );
657  fStepData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
658  fStepDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new TwoVectorAction( tTwoVector, tArray ) ) );
659  return;
660  }
661  KThreeVector* tThreeVector = anComponent->As< KThreeVector >();
662  if( tThreeVector != NULL )
663  {
664  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a three_vector" << eom )
665  vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray >::New();
666  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
667  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 3 );
668  fStepData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
669  fStepDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new ThreeVectorAction( tThreeVector, tArray ) ) );
670  return;
671  }
672 
673  bool* tBool = anComponent->As< bool >();
674  if( tBool != NULL )
675  {
676  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a bool" << eom )
677  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring bool object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
678  return;
679  }
680 
681  unsigned short* tUShort = anComponent->As< unsigned short >();
682  if( tUShort != NULL )
683  {
684  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is an unsigned_short" << eom )
685  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring unsigned short object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
686  return;
687  }
688  short* tShort = anComponent->As< short >();
689  if( tShort != NULL )
690  {
691  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a short" << eom )
692  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring short object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
693  return;
694  }
695 
696  unsigned int* tUInt = anComponent->As< unsigned int >();
697  if( tUInt != NULL )
698  {
699  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a unsigned_int" << eom )
700  vtkSmartPointer< vtkUnsignedIntArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkUnsignedIntArray >::New();
701  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
702  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
703  fStepData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
704  fStepDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new UIntAction( tUInt, tArray ) ) );
705  return;
706  }
707  int* tInt = anComponent->As< int >();
708  if( tInt != NULL )
709  {
710  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is an int" << eom )
711  vtkSmartPointer< vtkIntArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkIntArray >::New();
712  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
713  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
714  fStepData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
715  fStepDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new IntAction( tInt, tArray ) ) );
716  return;
717  }
718 
719  unsigned long* tULong = anComponent->As< unsigned long >();
720  if( tULong != NULL )
721  {
722  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is an unsigned_long" << eom )
723  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring unsigned long object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
724  return;
725  }
726  long* tLong = anComponent->As< long >();
727  if( tLong != NULL )
728  {
729  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a long" << eom )
730  wtrmsg( eWarning ) << " ignoring long object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
731  return;
732  }
733 
734  float* tFloat = anComponent->As< float >();
735  if( tFloat != NULL )
736  {
737  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a float" << eom )
738  vtkSmartPointer< vtkFloatArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkFloatArray >::New();
739  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
740  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
741  fStepData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
742  fStepDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new FloatAction( tFloat, tArray ) ) );
743  return;
744  }
745  double* tDouble = anComponent->As< double >();
746  if( tDouble != NULL )
747  {
748  wtrmsg_debug( " object <" << anComponent->GetName() << "> is a double" << eom )
749  vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray > tArray = vtkSmartPointer< vtkDoubleArray >::New();
750  tArray->SetName( anComponent->GetName().c_str() );
751  tArray->SetNumberOfComponents( 1 );
752  fStepData->GetPointData()->AddArray( tArray );
753  fStepDataActions.insert( ActionEntry( anComponent, new DoubleAction( tDouble, tArray ) ) );
754  return;
755  }
756 
757  wtrmsg( eError ) << "VTK writer cannot make data action for object <" << anComponent->GetName() << ">" << eom;
758 
759  return;
760  }
761 
762  void KSWriteVTK::FillStep()
763  {
764  if( fStepPointFlag == true )
765  {
766  if( fStepDataFlag == true )
767  {
768  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is filling a step" << eom );
769 
770  fStepPointAction.first->PullUpdate();
771  fStepPointAction.second->Execute();
772  fStepPointAction.first->PullDeupdate();
773 
774  for( ActionIt tIt = fStepDataActions.begin(); tIt != fStepDataActions.end(); tIt++ )
775  {
776  tIt->first->PullUpdate();
777  tIt->second->Execute();
778  tIt->first->PullDeupdate();
779  }
780  }
781  }
782 
783  return;
784  }
785 
786  void KSWriteVTK::BreakStep()
787  {
788  if( fStepPointFlag == true )
789  {
790  if( fStepDataFlag == true )
791  {
792  if( fStepIds.empty() == false )
793  {
794  wtrmsg_debug( "VTK writer <" << GetName() << "> is breaking a step set with <" << fStepIds.size() << "> elements" << eom );
795 
796  vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyLine > tPolyLine = vtkSmartPointer< vtkPolyLine >::New();
797  tPolyLine->GetPointIds()->SetNumberOfIds( fStepIds.size() );
798  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fStepIds.size(); tIndex++ )
799  {
800  tPolyLine->GetPointIds()->SetId( tIndex, fStepIds.at( tIndex ) );
801  }
802  fStepIds.clear();
803  fStepLines->InsertNextCell( tPolyLine );
804  }
805  }
806  }
807 
808  return;
809  }
810 
811  STATICINT sKSWriteVTKDict =
812  KSDictionary< KSWriteVTK >::AddCommand( &KSWriteVTK::SetStepPoint, &KSWriteVTK::ClearStepPoint, "set_step_point", "clear_step_point" ) +
813  KSDictionary< KSWriteVTK >::AddCommand( &KSWriteVTK::SetStepData, &KSWriteVTK::ClearStepData, "set_step_data", "clear_step_data" ) +
814  KSDictionary< KSWriteVTK >::AddCommand( &KSWriteVTK::SetTrackPoint, &KSWriteVTK::ClearTrackPoint, "set_track_point", "clear_track_point" ) +
815  KSDictionary< KSWriteVTK >::AddCommand( &KSWriteVTK::SetTrackData, &KSWriteVTK::ClearTrackData, "set_track_data", "clear_track_data" );
816 
817 }
